statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT review_date, development_plan FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, feedback FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, feedback, development_plan FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT development_plan FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS review_count FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING review_count > 1 ORDER BY review_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews
SELECT employee_id, review_date FROM employee_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT feedback FROM employee_reviews WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT * FROM career_development_plans
SELECT employee_id, plan_description FROM career_development_plans WHERE plan_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, review_date FROM employee_reviews WHERE employee_id = 5 AND review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, employee_id, feedback FROM employee_reviews WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, plan_description, plan_status FROM career_development_plans WHERE plan_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role='Manager';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_name, development_plan FROM employees JOIN career_development ON employees.employee_id = career_development.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employees.employee_name AS 'Employee', performance_reviews.review_text AS 'Review' FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id;

SELECT employees.employee_name AS 'Employee', career_development.development_plan AS 'Development Plan' FROM employees JOIN career_development ON employees.employee_id = career_development.employee_id WHERE target_completion_date > '2022-06-30';

SELECT employee_name, COUNT(review_id) AS 'Review Count' FROM employees LEFT JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 0;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT plan_description, plan_due_date FROM career_development_plans ORDER BY plan_due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, review_date FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id;

SELECT employees.employee_name, feedback_text FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id JOIN feedback ON performance_reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, review_text FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM Departments WHERE manager_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CareerDevelopmentPlans ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.department = Departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT review_date, review_text FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department IN ('Engineering', 'Marketing', 'Finance') ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT plan_description FROM CareerDevelopmentPlans WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01';
